5 void PlannerInterface::initialize(std::string robot_name, std::string config_file, std::string robot_description="robot_description")
6 {
7  robot_name_ = robot_name;
8  robot_description_ = robot_description;
9 
10  ros::NodeHandle nh;
11  path_visualization_ = nh.advertise<visualization_msgs::MarkerArray>(robot_name_ + "/planned_path_visualization", 10);
12  joint_state_sub_ = nh.subscribe("joint_states/", 1, &PlannerInterface::jointStateCB, this);
13  tf_sub_ = nh.subscribe("/tf", 1, &PlannerInterface::tfCB, this);
14 
15  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep();
16 
17  if(!createModels(config_file))
18  {
19  ROS_FATAL("PathPlanner::init() -- failed creating RDF models");
20  return;
21  }
22 }
